oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Evaluation of the Svanovirâ„¢ Enzyme-linked Immunosorbent Assay (ELISA) for Bovine Leukosis, Bovine Viral Diarrhea and Mycobacterium paratuberculosis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Keefe, Greg
VanLeeuwen, John
Hotham, Stacie
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: serologic tests
Bovine Leukosis Virus
Bovine Viral Diarrhea
M. paratuberculosis
Johne's Disease
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three novel serologic tests (SVANOVA Biotech, Uppsala, Sweden) were evaluated: an indirect ELISA for Bovine Leukosis Virus (BLV), an indirect ELISA for Bovine Viral Diarrhea (BVD), and an indirect ELISA for M. paratuberculosis (Johne's Diease).
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2000; 181-182
